mapper.sql: institid, instit_code, creationtime, short_name, instit_name, email, creator, instit_type, parent_id, ts, dr
mapper.select:
SELECT
FROM example_organization where 1=1
and instit_code like CONCAT(CONCAT('%', #{condition.searchParam}),'%') or instit_name like CONCAT(CONCAT('%', #{condition.searchParam}),'%')

SELECT
FROM example_organization where 1=1
and instit_code = #{condition.institCode, jdbcType=VARCHAR}
and instit_code like CONCAT(CONCAT('%', #{condition.searchParam}),'%') or instit_name like CONCAT(CONCAT('%', #{condition.searchParam}),'%')
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO example_organization( creationtime, short_name, instit_name, email, institid, creator, instit_type, parent_id, instit_code, ts, dr ) VALUES ( #{creationtime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{short_name,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{instit_name,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{email,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{institid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{creator,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{instit_type,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{parent_id,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{instit_code,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{ts,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{dr,jdbcType=NUMERIC} )
mapper.update: UPDATE example_organization SET creationtime=#{item.creationtime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, short_name=#{item.short_name,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, instit_name=#{item.instit_name,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, email=#{item.email,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, institid=#{item.institid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, creator= #{item.creator,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, instit_type=#{item.instit_type,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, parent_id=#{item.parent_id,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, instit_code=#{item.instit_code,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, ts=#{item.ts,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, dr=#{item.dr,jdbcType=NUMERIC} WHERE institid = #{item.institid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
mapper.delete:
delete from example_organization where institid in
#{item.institid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
